content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal preferences or the ability to watch TV shows. However, there are several TV shows that have received critical acclaim and have been popular among audiences in recent years. Some examples include Game of Thrones, Breaking Bad, Stranger Things, The Crown, The Handmaid's Tale, and many others. The choice of TV shows to watch depends on individual preferences, interests, and availability, and it's always recommended to do some research before selecting a TV show to watch.
